title: AI Persuasion Experiment
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott wants to write a persuasive essay about AI risk
- He realizes there are already many essays on the topic and wants to make sure his is worth writing
- Scott wants to conduct an experiment to see if persuasive essays really work and if their effectiveness can be measured
- He invites anyone, particularly those who are not informed or interested in AI risk, to participate in the experiment

Key learnings
- Scott is open to the idea of not writing his own essay on AI risk if he finds existing essays to be better
- He believes measuring the effectiveness of persuasive essays can help improve their quality 
- Scott values input from a diverse group of people, regardless of their familiarity or interest in the topic

Key questions
- How can we measure the effectiveness of persuasive essays?
- To what degree do persuasive essays work?
- What makes a persuasive essay successful?
